Please provide accurate information to help us understand your health status and give you related content.
Do you have any health conditions that need attention?
Gangguan pencernaan terkait gula (misalnya, intoleransi laktosa)
Kebutuhan diet khusus (misalnya, diet rendah karbohidrat)
How often do you consume sweet foods or drinks in a week?
How much sugar (in grams) do you usually consume in a day?
> dari 3 sendok teh (lebih dari 12 g gula)
How often do you exercise in a week?
Do you have any particular food preferences?
Do you have allergies or intolerances to certain foods?
Do you have a food or ingredient that you really like?
Do you have a food or ingredient you don\'t like?
Excludes meat, fish, and poultry but includes plant-based foods, dairy products, and eggs.
Excludes all animal products, including meat, dairy, eggs, and honey, focusing on plant-based foods.
Focuses on foods presumed to be available to Paleolithic humans, including lean meats, fish, fruits, vegetables, nuts, and seeds, while excluding processed foods, grains, legumes, and dairy.
Emphasizes foods rich in dietary fiber, such as fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and legumes, to promote digestive health.
Prioritizes foods high in protein, such as lean meats, fish, eggs, dairy products, legumes, nuts, and seeds, to support muscle growth and repair.

Limits carbohydrate intake, focusing on protein and fat-rich foods, and often includes vegetables, meat, fish, eggs, and dairy, while excluding or reducing grains, starchy vegetables, and sugary foods.
Restricts fat intake, emphasizing lean proteins, fruits, vegetables, and whole grains, while reducing consumption of fatty foods, oils, and dairy products.
Aims to reduce sodium intake to manage blood pressure and heart health, focusing on fresh, unprocessed foods and minimizing salt usage.
Limits the intake of added sugars and high-sugar foods, focusing on whole, unprocessed foods like vegetables, fruits, lean proteins, and whole grains.
Avoids all forms of alcohol, focusing on non-alcoholic beverages and foods.
Incorporates a variety of food groups in moderate amounts, aiming for a balanced intake of carbohydrates, proteins, and fats to support overall health

Capture the full dish in brightly lit conditions.
Use a plain background and avoid shadows or glare.
Keep the camera steady and include all parts of the dish.
For soupy foods, ensure contents are visible.
If results are incorrect, retake from another angle.
Thank you for using the GlucoFit app!
